channel.title: Testimonials on haimantika

item.title: DevRel Thought Leadership
item.description: “As a startup building a product in the developer education space, we reached out to Haimantika to understand more about the DevRel space. Her multi-faceted experiences through her DevRel journey gave us some amazing insights and helped us navigate through and rethink some of the features we were incoporporating.” - Raghavendra Sirigeri , Founder at Questodev
